targets.expr: sum by (pod) (autocreation_message_counter_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", step="toCreate"}) - sum by (pod) (autocreation_message_counter_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", step="toCreate-failed"})

sum by (pod) (autocreation_message_counter_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", step="toDelete"}) - sum by (pod) (autocreation_message_counter_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", step="toDelete-failed"})

sum by(pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"}) - sum by (pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"} offset 1m)

sum by(pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"}) - sum by (pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"} offset 1h)

sum by(pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"}) - sum by (pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"} offset 24h)

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", topic="$full_stock_topic"}) / sum by (pod) (spring_kafka_listener_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", name=~"(.*)full(.*)"})

sum by(pod) (increase(spring_kafka_listener_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", name=~"(.*)full(.*)"}[1m])) / sum by (pod) (increase(spring_kafka_listener_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", name=~"(.*)full(.*)"}[1m]))

sum by(pod) (increase(spring_kafka_listener_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", name=~"(.*)full(.*)"}[10m])) / sum by (pod) (increase(spring_kafka_listener_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", name=~"(.*)full(.*)"}[10m]))
